imdb.plot outline: The popular TCM franchise Friday Night Spotlight continues in May 2014 with an examination of the film industry in Australia, where pioneering efforts in cinema began in the late 1800s and continues to flourish today. The festival concentrates on Australia's New Wave movement of the 1970s and '80s, during which many strikingly photographed films focused on survival of one type or another amid harsh yet beautiful landscapes. The series is hosted by two-time Oscar速-nominated Australian actress Jacki Weaver, best known for her Academy Award速-nominated performance in 2010's Animal Kingdom and her role in 2012's Silver Linings Playbook. Each Friday night Weaver will introduce the first three films from her native land.
imdb.title: TCM Spotlight: Australian Cinema
plot: The popular TCM franchise Friday Night Spotlight continues in May 2014 with an examination of the film industry in Australia, where pioneering efforts in cinema began in the late 1800s and continues to flourish today. The festival concentrates on Australia's New Wave movement of the 1970s and '80s, during which many strikingly photographed films focused on survival of one type or another amid harsh yet beautiful landscapes. The series is hosted by two-time Oscar速-nominated Australian actress Jacki Weaver, best known for her Academy Award速-nominated performance in 2010's Animal Kingdom and her role in 2012's Silver Linings Playbook. Each Friday night Weaver will introduce the first three films from her native land.
